name: Corp-Corp.com
overview:
Corp-Corp.com is one of the fastest growing technology recruiters network with over 5,000 consulting or staffing companies posting 25,000+ requirements a month.

At Corp-Corp.com we have eliminated the slow search process using a disruptive innovation called FETCH. Thus we made the recruiting a real productive process by connecting relevant job and best fit candidate in 30 seconds or less

In summary, â€¢ We are focused only on technology jobs and candidates. â€¢ We FETCH the best fit candidates in 30 seconds or less, thus eliminating search and the manual review process, traditionally used in recruiting business. (Saves 3 hours for a recruiter per day). â€¢ We connect the matching candidates and recruiters anywhere through the Internet or Mobile for near real-time connectivity.
